means: 理由
原因
理性
理智
推理，思考
争辩
辩论
向…解释
[人名] 里曾

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"辩论，争论，说理"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: argue, quarrel, debate, dispute, discuss, reason
means: argue ：指提出理由或证据为自己或自己一方的看法或立场辩护，着重说理、论证和企图说服。
quarrel ：指两人之间或两个团体之间不友好的、吵吵嚷嚷地大声争论某事，尤指"吵嘴、吵架"。
debate ：侧重指意见等对立的双方之间正式或公开的争辩。
dispute ：侧重对分歧进行激烈或热烈的争论或争辩，带一定感情色彩，常隐含"各持已见"或"争论不休"意味。
discuss ：最常用词，指就某一或某些问题表明观点、看法等，以便统一认识，解决问题。
reason ：指据理力争以说服对方或求得对问题作更深入的研究。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"原因"之意。
means: cause ： 指直接导致事情发生的原因，与所发生的事个有因果关系。
reason ： 强调指从逻辑推理上得出的结论性原因，不是直接说明起因。
excuse ： 指为自己辩解，希望得到谅解时所提出的种种理由，是借口性的理由。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"思考，判断，思索"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: think, deliberate, meditate, muse, reason, reflect, speculate
means: think ： 一般用词，指开动脑筋形成看法或得出结论的脑力活动。不着重结论是否正确，见解是否有用。
deliberate ： 指缓慢、按部就班地作仔细而认真的思考或判断。
meditate ： 语气较强，指认真地长时间集中精力进行思考。
muse ： 通常指漫无目的地猜想。
reason ： 指根据资料、证据或事实进行推断，作出结论或判断的逻辑思维活动。
reflect ： 指回想或回顾，侧重认真而冷静地反复地思考某个问题，尤指对已发生事情的思索。
speculate ： 指推论过程，隐含在证据不足的基础上作出推测或设想。

sentence.Network_en: I really don't see any reason for changing it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真的不明白为什么要改变它。

sentence.Network_en: There's a reason why women don't read this stuff; it's not funny.
sentence.Network_cn: 女人不读这种东西是有原因的，它并不好笑。

sentence.Network_en: To an extent, that is the reason for the meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 在某种程度上，那就是召开这次会议的原因。

lj.lj_ly: he indulged Andrew beyond all reason.
lj.lj_ls: 他毫无道理地纵容安德鲁。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to convey that one doesn't know the reason for a particular state of affairs, often with the implication that one finds it strange or surprising
jx.jx_cn_mean: 不知什么原因，不知何故

lj.lj_ly: for some reason he likes you.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 服从理智；听取意见，接受道理

lj.lj_ly: the child is usually too emotionally overwrought to listen to reason.
lj.lj_ls: 这孩子通常太受感情左右，而不顾理智。

phrase.cizu_name: theirs (或 ours) not to reason why

jx.jx_en_mean: used to suggest that it is not someone's (or one's) place to question a situation or system

jx.jx_cn_mean: 合情理；是当然的，自不待言

lj.lj_ly: it stands to reason that if you can eradicate the fear the nervousness will subside.
lj.lj_ls: 如果你根除恐惧心理，紧张感会随之减轻，这是显而易见的事情。

jx.jx_en_mean: With good sense or justification; reasonably.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 合乎情理地：具有良好情理或证明的；合情合理地

jx.jx_en_mean: Within the bounds of good sense or practicality.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 合理地：在良好的情理和现实范围之内地
正当地：有充足理由地；正当地

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French reisun (noun), raisoner (verb), from a variant of Latin ratio(n-), from the verb reri 'consider'

encyclopedia.content: 机动战士高达 SEED DESTINY 片尾曲 《reason》——《机动战士高达 SEED DESTINY》第1~13话的结尾曲。 作曲：y@suo ohtani； 作词：shungo 编曲：ats- 唱： 玉置成実 （玉置成实）（たまきなみ，Tamaki Nami）歌词及其翻译 远く离（はな）れてるほどに 近くに感じてる /越是相隔遥远越是感觉近在眼前 tooku hanareteru hodoni chikakuni kanjiteru 寂しさも强さへと 変换(かわ)ってく/ 寂寞也可化为坚强… sabishisamo tsuyosa e t

entry.def: The reason for something is a fact or situation which explains why it happens or what causes it to happen.

example.ex: There is a reason for every important thing that happens...
example.tran: 每件重要事情的发生都有原因。

example.ex: Who would have a reason to want to kill her?

entry.def: If you say that you have reason to believe something or to have a particular emotion, you mean that you have evidence for your belief or there is a definite cause of your feeling.

example.ex: They had reason to believe there could be trouble...
example.tran: 他们有理由相信可能会遇到麻烦。

example.ex: He had every reason to be upset...

entry.def: The ability that people have to think and to make sensible judgments can be referred to as reason .

example.ex: Mike is my voice of reason. He thinks logically and points out where I'm going wrong.
example.tran: 迈克帮我保持理智。他的思维很有逻辑性，可以指出我的错误。

entry.def: If you reason that something is true, you decide that it is true after thinking carefully about all the facts.

example.ex: I reasoned that changing my diet would lower my cholesterol level...
example.tran: 我推断改变自己的饮食可以降低我的胆固醇水平。

example.ex: 'Listen,' I reasoned, 'it doesn't take a genius to figure out what Adam's up to.'
example.tran: “听着，”我分析道，“要弄清楚亚当想要干什么很容易。”

entry.tran: （常用来暗指不赞成某人的所作所为）只有自己知道为什么，出于自身的理由
entry.def: If you do not know why someone did something, you can say that they did it for reasons best known to themselves. You usually use this expression when you do not agree with what they did.

example.ex: For reasons best known to himself, Algie changed his name.
example.tran: 不知是出于什么原因，阿尔吉改了名字。

entry.tran: 因为；由于；由…引起；以…为理由
entry.def: If one thing happens by reason of another, it happens because of it.

example.ex: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position...
example.tran: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

example.ex: He pleaded innocent by reason of insanity.
example.tran: 他以精神不健全为由申辩无罪。

entry.def: If you try to make someone listen to reason, you try to persuade them to listen to sensible arguments and be influenced by them.

example.ex: The company's top executives had refused to listen to reason.
example.tran: 公司的高层管理人员拒绝理智行事。

entry.tran: 无缘无故；莫名其妙；没有理由
entry.def: If you say that something happened or was done for no reason ,for no good reason, or for no reason at all, you mean that there was no obvious reason why it happened or was done.

example.ex: The guards, he said, would punch them for no reason...
example.tran: 他说警卫会无缘无故殴打他们。

example.ex: For no reason at all the two men started to laugh.
example.tran: 两个人莫名其妙地开始大笑。

entry.tran: 活着的理由；生存的原因
entry.def: If a person or thing is someone's reason for living or their reason for being, they are the most important thing in that person's life.

example.ex: Chloe is my reason for living.
example.tran: 克洛艾是我活着的理由。

entry.tran: 不知为何;不知什么原因
entry.def: If you say that something happened or is true for some reason, you mean that you know it happened or is true, but you do not know why.

example.ex: For some reason, the curtains were shut...
example.tran: 不知什么原因，窗帘拉着。

example.ex: For some inexplicable reason she was attracted to Patrick.
example.tran: 因为某些无法解释的原因，她被帕特里克所吸引。

entry.tran: 正当的;合乎情理的;理智范围内的
entry.def: If you say that you will do anything within reason, you mean that you will do anything that is fair or reasonable and not too extreme.

example.ex: I will take any job that comes along, within reason...
example.tran: 我会接受任何给我的工作，只要是正当的。

example.ex: It means working, within reason, for whatever time is necessary.
example.tran: 这意味着在合理的范围内花费所有必要的时间工作。

means.word_mean: 1. a rational motive for a belief or action;
2. an explanation of the cause of some phenomenon;

sentences.sentence: "the reason a steady state was never reached was that the back pressure built up too slowly"

means.word_mean: 3. the capacity for rational thought or inference or discrimination;

sentences.sentence: "we are told that man is endowed with reason and capable of distinguishing good from evil"

means.word_mean: 4. the state of having good sense and sound judgment;

sentences.sentence: "he had to rely less on reason than on rousing their emotions"

means.word_mean: 5. a justification for something existing or happening;
6. a fact that logically justifies some premise or conclusion;

sentences.sentence: "there is reason to believe he is lying"

means.word_mean: 1. decide by reasoning; draw or come to a conclusion;

sentences.sentence: "We reasoned that it was cheaper to rent than to buy a house"

auth_sentence.content: The reason given was to concentrate on album sales.
auth_sentence.res_content: The reason given was to concentrate on album sales.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The reason given was to concentrate on album sales.

auth_sentence.content: There is every reason why it shouldn't be.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is every reason why it shouldn't be.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is every reason why it shouldn't be.

auth_sentence.content: Grandad is the reason why I'm a fighter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Grandad is the reason why I'm a fighter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Grandad is the reason why I'm a fighter.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合理的，有道理的；通情达理的；适度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: reason原因；理性+able能……的→adj.合理的，有道理的；通情达理的；适度的
reason计算,考虑→推理；说服→原因
reason计算,考虑→推理；说服→原因

Sentence.sentence: I suspect the reason is a deep-rooted love of the fire.

Moreover, students should be prepared not just for their first job, but for their 4th and 5th jobs, as there's little reason to doubt that people entering the workforce today will be called upon to play many different roles over the course of their careers
The first reason is that we need it to keep our economy running.
But this vote of confidence in Oprah sends a troubling message at precisely the time when American universities need to do more to advance the cause of reason.

It seems very good for Harvard to honor such a high profile popularizer of the irrational…… at a time when political and religious nonsense so jeopardize the rule of reason in this allegedly enlightened democracy and around the world
Reasons for this ranged from inheritance disputes to hostility between spouses.

sentences.en: I can only guess the reason.
His actions showed a lack of reason.
sentences.cn: 他的行动表明缺乏理智。

sentences.en: A man can reason but an animal can't.
sentences.cn: 人能推理, 而动物则不能。

sentences.en: I reasoned that since she had not answered my letter she must be angry with me.
sentences.cn: 我想她没有给我回信一定是在生我的气。

sentences.en: He reasoned that if we start at now, we could arrive before noon.
sentences.cn: 他争辩着说如果我们现在出发, 中午之前一定能到达。

jushi.english: She lost her reason in consequence of a violent emotion caused by a fire.
jushi.chinese: 她因失火而过分伤心,以致失去理智。
